text: Zapatista(s) may refer to: * Liberation Army of the South, formed 1910s, a Mexican insurgent group involved in the Mexican Revolution * Zapatista Army of National Liberation, formed 1994, a Mexican indigenous armed revolutionary group based in Chiapas * An oil painting by José Clemente Orozco * The ideologies of Zapatismo and Neozapatismo ==See also== *Emiliano Zapata (1879–1919), Mexican revolutionary
title: Zapatista
